title: 820-01041 kernel panic sleep wake issue
message:
system crashing, was able to boot into safe mode and turn off sleep setting, MacBook is on and working but not sellable in this condition, wondering if there is a fix for this, it is a very common issue , 
panic(cpu 6 caller 0xffffff7fa8b33f00): "virtual bool IOAccelDisplayMachine::display_mode_did_change(uint32_t): AMDRadeonAccelerator driver returns false" @IOAccelDisplayMachine.cpp:345

title: 820-01041 kernel panic sleep wake issue
message:
Seems to be GPU related issue.
Did you try to reinstall the macOS?
You can also try DFU restore.

Just in case, check SMC_LID_LEFT/RIGHT and IPD_LID_OPEN signals, when close/open the lid.

title: 820-01041 kernel panic sleep wake issue
message: just got home from work, laptop is still on, but in safe mode, sleep settings have been changed, so i restarted, unit is still crashing, if i hold shift key it will boot normal, prob still gpu issue,  but figured i would add new info that it only loads in safe mode,  not sure if that points to a different issue

title: 820-01041 kernel panic sleep wake issue
message:
In safe mode GPU driver is not loaded.
That explains why stays on...
